attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I dont know about anyone else, but i think that there needs to be a change in MPs of this county, the goverment should be made a new. Parliment laws should be remade from scratch, tighter laws on what the MPs can spend there money on, Finaly, people that actualy know what should be done!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
